pages.title: Shine Bright
pages.text: Moving forward, you'll need to be able to harvest harder materials than is possible with simple $(item)Iron$(). If you can recall, $(item)Diamond$() was prized for its beauty before, but is also incredibly hardy. We can make good use of tools made from it, but first we'll need to collect it.

As the composition of $(item)Diamond$() and $(item)Charcoal$() are much the same, we can use large amounts of $(item)Charcoal$() with $(item)Liquid Mana$() to create small amounts of $(item)Diamond$().

pages.heading: Diamond Nuggets
pages.description: In world transmutation. Requires a pool of at least 4 blocks of Liquid Mana
